title: How to Watch the 2025 Grammys Livestream Online
description: The 2025 Grammys are right around the corner. Here’s everything you need to know for streaming the star-studded event online, plus the full list of confirmed performances and nominees. author: Claire Franken
excerpt: The Grammy Awards are Sunday, Feb. 2 — here's how to watch the ceremony online without cable. Plus, view the full list of nominees.
text: All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, TVLine may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes. The 2025 Grammys are right around the corner. Here’s everything you need to know for streaming the star-studded event online, plus the full list of confirmed performances and nominees. How to Watch 2025 Grammys Live Online As previously announced, Trevor Noah returns to host this year’s ceremony, which kicks off Sunday, Feb. 2 at 8/7c, on CBS. (But mark your calendars: The show is set to end its 54-year CBS run in 2027.) Heading into Sunday’s event, Beyoncé leads the pack with 11 nominations, including nods for Album of the Year for Cowboy Carter, and Song of the Year for “Texas Hold ‘Em.” Charli XCX, Billie Eilish, Kendrick Lamar and Post Malone follow, as each walks into the night with seven nominations. Meanwhile Sabrina Carpenter and Chappell Roan are among the first-time nominees — and performers for the evening. Taylor Swift, who will take the stage as a presenter at the ceremony, is nominated for six awards honoring her latest album, The Tortured Poets Department. Despite many L.A.-based productions being postponed due to ongoing wildfires, the Grammy Awards are proceeding as scheduled. As previously reported, however, the telecast will be raising funds to support relief efforts. If you’re a cord-cutter hoping to catch all of the Grammys performances and results, the show can be livestreamed with the Paramount Plus With Showtime plan. Below, we’re also rounding up all the live-TV streaming services that include CBS so you can see all the other ways to watch the Grammys online without cable. (Note: CBS is only available in select markets. Always confirm that your area is eligible for CBS before signing up for a live-TV streaming service.) How to Watch the 2025 Grammys Online: Paramount Plus With Showtime Courtesy of Paramount+ The best way to watch the ceremony online is by signing up for Paramount Plus With Showtime. The 2025 Grammys will stream live for subscribers to this premium plan only! For those who want to subscribe to the less-expensive Paramount Plus Essential plan, you’ll be able to watch the ceremony on-demand the day after it airs. To watch the ceremony live, opt for the ad-free $12.99/month Paramount Plus With Showtime plan, which includes your local live CBS station. For next-day on-demand streaming, sign up for the ad-supported Paramount Plus Essential plan at $7.99/month, which does not include Showtime or your local live CBS station. How to Watch the 2025 Grammys Online Free: DirecTV Stream Courtesy of DirecTV DirecTV Stream offers a five-day free trial and a few different subscription options for a variety of prices so you can choose whichever fits your budget. The Choice package is the most popular and offers CBS in select markets in addition to over 100 other channels for $114.99/month. How to Watch the 2025 Grammys Online Free: Fubo TV Fubo is another way to watch the Grammys online for free thanks to its seven-day free trial. Fubo’s Pro plan grants subscribers access to CBS in certain markets. Plus, Fubo is offering $20 off its plans, bringing the price down to $64.99/month. And for that price, you not only get access to CBS, but also can watch over 175 other channels. More good news? You can cancel and change your subscription at any time, making Fubo an easy and low-commitment way for watching the 2025 Grammy Awards ceremony online for free. How to Watch the 2025 Grammys Online Without Cable: Hulu + Live TV Courtesy of Hulu The Hulu + Live TV subscription is a more expensive option for watching the Grammys without cable, ringing in at $82.99/month. With that being said, you get a lot of content with this bundle subscription. You gain access to the Hulu streaming library, CBS, ESPN+ and Disney+. This is a comprehensive packing for addressing all you cord-cutter needs. When Are the 2025 Grammys? Date, Start Time, Channel The 67th Annual Grammy Awards start on Sunday, Feb. 2 at 8/7c and take place at the Crypto.com Arena in Los Angeles, Calif. Who’s Performing at the 2025 Grammys? As previously announced, the following artists will be performing live at the 2025 Grammys: * Benson Boone — first-time nominee up for Best New Artist, propelled by the success of his single “Beautiful Things.” * Billie Eilish — nine-time Grammy winner up for seven Grammys this year, including Record of the Year and Song of the Year for “Birds of a Feather.” * Chappell Roan — first-time nominee up for six awards, including Best New Artist and Album of the Year. * Charli XCX — nominated for eight Grammys this year, including Album of the Year for BRAT and Best Music Video for “360.” * Doechii — first-time nominee up for three trophies, including Best New Artist and Best Rap Album. * RAYE — first-time nominee up for three Grammys this year, including Best New Artist and Songwriter of the Year. * Sabrina Carpenter — first-time nominee up for six awards, including Best New Artist and Song of the Year for “Espresso.” * Shakira — three-time Grammy winner nominated for Best Latin Pop Album for Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran. * Teddy Swims — first-time nominee up for Best New Artist, made popular by his breakthrough single “Lose Control.” Additionally, Brad Paisley, Brittany Howard, Coldplay’s Chris Martin, Cynthia Erivo, Herbie Hancock, Jacob Collier, Janelle Monáe, John Legend, Lainey Wilson, Sheryl Crow, St. Vincent and Stevie Wonder will make appearances. Taylor Swift will take the stage as a presenter. Who’s Hosting the 2025 Grammys? As mentioned above, Trevor Noah is returning as host for the 2025 Grammys. 2025 Grammy Nominees Below is a full list of every nominee at the 2025 Grammys. For a full winners list, head here. The 2025 Grammys are right around the corner. Here’s everything you need to know for streaming the star-studded event online, plus the full list of confirmed performances and nominees.

How to Watch 2025 Grammys Live Online

As previously announced, Trevor Noah returns to host this year’s ceremony, which kicks off Sunday, Feb. 2 at 8/7c, on CBS. (But mark your calendars: The show is set to end its 54-year CBS run in 2027.)

Heading into Sunday’s event, Beyoncé leads the pack with 11 nominations, including nods for Album of the Year for Cowboy Carter, and Song of the Year for “Texas Hold ‘Em.” Charli XCX, Billie Eilish, Kendrick Lamar and Post Malone follow, as each walks into the night with seven nominations. Meanwhile Sabrina Carpenter and Chappell Roan are among the first-time nominees — and performers for the evening.

Taylor Swift, who will take the stage as a presenter at the ceremony, is nominated for six awards honoring her latest album, The Tortured Poets Department.

Despite many L.A.-based productions being postponed due to ongoing wildfires, the Grammy Awards are proceeding as scheduled. As previously reported, however, the telecast will be raising funds to support relief efforts.

If you’re a cord-cutter hoping to catch all of the Grammys performances and results, the show can be livestreamed with the Paramount Plus With Showtime plan. Below, we’re also rounding up all the live-TV streaming services that include CBS so you can see all the other ways to watch the Grammys online without cable.

(Note: CBS is only available in select markets. Always confirm that your area is eligible for CBS before signing up for a live-TV streaming service.)

How to Watch the 2025 Grammys Online: Paramount Plus With Showtime

The best way to watch the ceremony online is by signing up for Paramount Plus With Showtime. The 2025 Grammys will stream live for subscribers to this premium plan only! For those who want to subscribe to the less-expensive Paramount Plus Essential plan, you’ll be able to watch the ceremony on-demand the day after it airs.

To watch the ceremony live, opt for the ad-free $12.99/month Paramount Plus With Showtime plan, which includes your local live CBS station. For next-day on-demand streaming, sign up for the ad-supported Paramount Plus Essential plan at $7.99/month, which does not include Showtime or your local live CBS station.

How to Watch the 2025 Grammys Online Free: DirecTV Stream

DirecTV Stream offers a five-day free trial and a few different subscription options for a variety of prices so you can choose whichever fits your budget. The Choice package is the most popular and offers CBS in select markets in addition to over 100 other channels for $114.99/month.

How to Watch the 2025 Grammys Online Free: Fubo TV

Fubo is another way to watch the Grammys online for free thanks to its seven-day free trial. Fubo’s Pro plan grants subscribers access to CBS in certain markets. Plus, Fubo is offering $20 off its plans, bringing the price down to $64.99/month. And for that price, you not only get access to CBS, but also can watch over 175 other channels. More good news? You can cancel and change your subscription at any time, making Fubo an easy and low-commitment way for watching the 2025 Grammy Awards ceremony online for free.

How to Watch the 2025 Grammys Online Without Cable: Hulu + Live TV

The Hulu + Live TV subscription is a more expensive option for watching the Grammys without cable, ringing in at $82.99/month. With that being said, you get a lot of content with this bundle subscription. You gain access to the Hulu streaming library, CBS, ESPN+ and Disney+. This is a comprehensive packing for addressing all you cord-cutter needs.

When Are the 2025 Grammys? Date, Start Time, Channel

The 67th Annual Grammy Awards start on Sunday, Feb. 2 at 8/7c and take place at the Crypto.com Arena in Los Angeles, Calif.

Who’s Performing at the 2025 Grammys?

As previously announced, the following artists will be performing live at the 2025 Grammys:

* Benson Boone — first-time nominee up for Best New Artist, propelled by the success of his single “Beautiful Things.”

* Billie Eilish — nine-time Grammy winner up for seven Grammys this year, including Record of the Year and Song of the Year for “Birds of a Feather.”

* Chappell Roan — first-time nominee up for six awards, including Best New Artist and Album of the Year.

* Charli XCX — nominated for eight Grammys this year, including Album of the Year for BRAT and Best Music Video for “360.”

* Doechii — first-time nominee up for three trophies, including Best New Artist and Best Rap Album.

* RAYE — first-time nominee up for three Grammys this year, including Best New Artist and Songwriter of the Year.

* Sabrina Carpenter — first-time nominee up for six awards, including Best New Artist and Song of the Year for “Espresso.”

* Shakira — three-time Grammy winner nominated for Best Latin Pop Album for Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran.

* Teddy Swims — first-time nominee up for Best New Artist, made popular by his breakthrough single “Lose Control.”

Additionally, Brad Paisley, Brittany Howard, Coldplay’s Chris Martin, Cynthia Erivo, Herbie Hancock, Jacob Collier, Janelle Monáe, John Legend, Lainey Wilson, Sheryl Crow, St. Vincent and Stevie Wonder will make appearances. Taylor Swift will take the stage as a presenter.

Who’s Hosting the 2025 Grammys?

As mentioned above, Trevor Noah is returning as host for the 2025 Grammys.
